overview: A Picture for Parco, recreates a 1980s commercial made for a Japanese department store chain by Kazumi Kurigami taking on the role previously played by an elegantly dressed Faye Dunaway sitting at a table, set against a black background, slowly and seductively eating a hardboiled egg. Filmed on the one-year anniversary of Dozier's last colposcopy, the piece evokes a range of intense feelings not present in the original. This film is part of the trilogy, "Close, but no Cigar." [Overview Courtesy of Ayanna Dozier]
title: A Picture for Parco
